headline.main: Axis Says Parleys Show Our 'Troubles'; Offer Cairo as Example of Weakness

lead_paragraph: Axis propaganda experts -- apparently taken off base by the actual American-British-Chinese conferences in North Africa -- drumming on the theme yesterday that a four-power meeting with Russia was under way at Teheran, Iran, sought to discredit it beforehand with an intensity perhaps betraying their own fears, The Associated Press said.
abstract: Berlin radio comment on Cairo-Teheran confs
snippet: Axis propaganda experts -- apparently taken off base by the actual American-British-Chinese conferences in North Africa -- drumming on the theme yesterday that a four-power meeting with Russia was under way at Teheran, Iran, sought to discredit it...
